options.content:
- Use Cases: This dashboard shows the engineering throughput and and cycle time, which helps to identify productivity and bottlenecks of the development process.
- Data Source Required: GitHub and Jira([transformation](https://devlake.apache.org/docs/UserManuals/ConfigUI/Jira#step-3---adding-transformation-rules-optional) required to tell DevLake what the story_points field is). You also need to do [team configuration](https://devlake.apache.org/docs/Configuration/TeamConfiguration) to use this dashboard.

targets.rawSql:
with _prs as(
  SELECT
    pr.id,
    pr.url,
    pr.created_date,
    pr.merged_date,
    pr.author_id,
    u.id as user_id,
    u.name as user_name,
    t.id as team_id,
    t.name as team
  FROM pull_requests pr
    join user_accounts ua on pr.author_id = ua.account_id
    join users u on ua.user_id = u.id
    join team_users tu on u.id = tu.user_id
    join teams t on tu.team_id = t.id
    join project_mapping pm on pr.base_repo_id = pm.row_id and pm.table = 'repos' 
  WHERE
    $__timeFilter(pr.created_date)
    and pm.project_name in (${project:sqlstring}+'')
)

SELECT
  DATE_ADD(date(created_date), INTERVAL -$interval(date(created_date))+1 DAY) as time,
  count(distinct case when team_id in (${team1:sqlstring}+'') then id else null end) as "Team1: Total PR Opened",
  count(distinct case when team_id in (${team2:sqlstring}+'') then id else null end) as "Team2: Total PR Opened"
FROM _prs
GROUP BY 1

with _prs as(
  SELECT
    pr.id,
    pr.url,
    pr.created_date,
    pr.merged_date,
    pr.author_id,
    u.id as user_id,
    u.name as user_name,
    t.id as team_id,
    t.name as team
  FROM pull_requests pr
    join project_mapping pm on pr.base_repo_id = pm.row_id and pm.table = 'repos' 
    join user_accounts ua on pr.author_id = ua.account_id
    join users u on ua.user_id = u.id
    join team_users tu on u.id = tu.user_id
    join teams t on tu.team_id = t.id
  WHERE
    $__timeFilter(pr.created_date)
    and pm.project_name in (${project:sqlstring}+'')
)

SELECT
  DATE_ADD(date(created_date), INTERVAL -$interval(date(created_date))+1 DAY) as time,
  count(distinct case when team_id in (${team1:sqlstring}+'') then id else null end)/(select count(distinct user_id) from team_users where team_id in (${team1:sqlstring}+'')) as "Team1: PR Opened per Member",
  count(distinct case when team_id in (${team2:sqlstring}+'') then id else null end)/(select count(distinct user_id) from team_users where team_id in (${team2:sqlstring}+'')) as "Team2: PR Opened per Member",
  count(distinct id)/(select count(*) from users) as "Org: PR Opened per Member"
FROM _prs
GROUP BY 1

with _prs as(
  SELECT
    pr.id,
    pr.url,
    pr.created_date,
    pr.merged_date,
    pr.author_id,
    u.id as user_id,
    u.name as user_name,
    t.id as team_id,
    t.name as team
  FROM pull_requests pr
    join project_mapping pm on pr.base_repo_id = pm.row_id and pm.table = 'repos' 
    join user_accounts ua on pr.author_id = ua.account_id
    join users u on ua.user_id = u.id
    join team_users tu on u.id = tu.user_id
    join teams t on tu.team_id = t.id
  WHERE
    $__timeFilter(pr.created_date)
    and pm.project_name in (${project:sqlstring}+'')
)

SELECT
  DATE_ADD(date(created_date), INTERVAL -$interval(date(created_date))+1 DAY) as time,
  count(distinct case 
    when team_id in (${team1:sqlstring}+'') and merged_date is not null then id 
    when team_id in (${team1:sqlstring}+'') and merged_date is null then null end) as "Team1: Total PR Merged",
  count(distinct case 
    when team_id in (${team2:sqlstring}+'') and merged_date is not null then id 
    when team_id in (${team2:sqlstring}+'') and merged_date is null then null end) as "Team2: Total PR Merged"
FROM _prs
GROUP BY 1

with _prs as(
  SELECT
    pr.id,
    pr.url,
    pr.created_date,
    pr.merged_date,
    pr.author_id,
    u.id as user_id,
    u.name as user_name,
    t.id as team_id,
    t.name as team
  FROM pull_requests pr
    join project_mapping pm on pr.base_repo_id = pm.row_id and pm.table = 'repos' 
    join user_accounts ua on pr.author_id = ua.account_id
    join users u on ua.user_id = u.id
    join team_users tu on u.id = tu.user_id
    join teams t on tu.team_id = t.id
  WHERE
    $__timeFilter(pr.created_date)
    and pm.project_name in (${project:sqlstring}+'')
)

SELECT
  DATE_ADD(date(created_date), INTERVAL -$interval(date(created_date))+1 DAY) as time,
  count(distinct case 
    when team_id in (${team1:sqlstring}+'') and merged_date is not null then id 
    when team_id in (${team1:sqlstring}+'') and merged_date is null then null end)/(select count(distinct user_id) from team_users where team_id in (${team1:sqlstring}+'')) as "Team1: PR Merged per Member",
  count(distinct case 
    when team_id in (${team2:sqlstring}+'') and merged_date is not null then id
    when team_id in (${team2:sqlstring}+'') and merged_date is null then null end)/(select count(distinct user_id) from team_users where team_id in (${team2:sqlstring}+'')) as "Team2: PR Merged per Member",
  count(distinct case when merged_date is not null then id end)/(select count(*) from users) as "Org: PR Merged per Member"
FROM _prs
GROUP BY 1

with _issues as(
  SELECT
    i.id,
    i.url,
    i.created_date,
    i.status,
    i.assignee_id,
    i.story_point,
    i.priority,
    u.id as user_id,
    u.name as user_name,
    t.id as team_id,
    t.name as team
  FROM issues i
	  join board_issues bi on i.id = bi.issue_id
	  join boards b on bi.board_id = b.id
	  join project_mapping pm on b.id = pm.row_id
  	join user_accounts ua on i.assignee_id = ua.account_id
    join users u on ua.user_id = u.id
    join team_users tu on u.id = tu.user_id
    join teams t on tu.team_id = t.id
  WHERE
    $__timeFilter(i.created_date)
    and pm.project_name in (${project:sqlstring}+'')
)

SELECT
  DATE_ADD(date(created_date), INTERVAL -$interval(date(created_date))+1 DAY) as time,
  -- count(i.id) as 'Issues Opened',
  count(distinct case when status = 'DONE' and team_id in (${team1:sqlstring}+'') then id else null end) as 'Team1: Issues Completed',
  count(distinct case when status = 'DONE' and team_id in (${team2:sqlstring}+'') then id else null end) as 'Team2: Issues Completed'
FROM _issues
GROUP BY 1

with _issues as(
  SELECT
    distinct i.id,
    i.url,
    i.created_date,
    i.status,
    i.assignee_id,
    i.story_point,
    i.priority,
    u.id as user_id,
    u.name as user_name,
    t.id as team_id,
    t.name as team
  FROM issues i
	  join board_issues bi on i.id = bi.issue_id
	  join boards b on bi.board_id = b.id
	  join project_mapping pm on b.id = pm.row_id
  	join user_accounts ua on i.assignee_id = ua.account_id
    join users u on ua.user_id = u.id
    join team_users tu on u.id = tu.user_id
    join teams t on tu.team_id = t.id
  WHERE
    $__timeFilter(i.created_date)
    and pm.project_name in (${project:sqlstring}+'')
  ORDER BY 1
)

SELECT
  DATE_ADD(date(created_date), INTERVAL -$interval(date(created_date))+1 DAY) as time,
  count(distinct case when status = 'DONE' and team_id in (${team1:sqlstring}+'') then id else null end)/(select count(distinct user_id) from team_users where team_id in (${team1:sqlstring}+'')) as 'Team1: Issues Completed per Member',
  count(distinct case when status = 'DONE' and team_id in (${team2:sqlstring}+'') then id else null end)/(select count(distinct user_id) from team_users where team_id in (${team2:sqlstring}+'')) as 'Team2: Issues Completed per Member',
  count(distinct id)/(select count(*) from users) as "Org: Issues Completed per Member"
FROM _issues
GROUP BY 1

with _issues as(
  SELECT
    distinct i.id,
    i.url,
    i.created_date,
    i.status,
    i.assignee_id,
    i.story_point,
    i.priority,
    u.id as user_id,
    u.name as user_name,
    t.id as team_id,
    t.name as team
  FROM issues i
	  join board_issues bi on i.id = bi.issue_id
	  join boards b on bi.board_id = b.id
	  join project_mapping pm on b.id = pm.row_id
  	join user_accounts ua on i.assignee_id = ua.account_id
    join users u on ua.user_id = u.id
    join team_users tu on u.id = tu.user_id
    join teams t on tu.team_id = t.id
  WHERE
    $__timeFilter(i.created_date)
    and pm.project_name in (${project:sqlstring}+'')
  ORDER BY 1
)

SELECT
  DATE_ADD(date(created_date), INTERVAL -$interval(date(created_date))+1 DAY) as time,
  -- count(i.id) as 'Issues Opened',
  sum(case when status = 'DONE' and team_id in (${team1:sqlstring}+'') then story_point else 0 end) as 'Team1: Story Points Completed',
  sum(case when status = 'DONE' and team_id in (${team2:sqlstring}+'') then story_point else 0 end) as 'Team2: Story Points Completed'
FROM _issues
GROUP BY 1

with _issues as(
  SELECT
    distinct i.id,
    i.url,
    i.created_date,
    i.status,
    i.assignee_id,
    i.story_point,
    i.priority,
    u.id as user_id,
    u.name as user_name,
    t.id as team_id,
    t.name as team
  FROM issues i
	  join board_issues bi on i.id = bi.issue_id
	  join boards b on bi.board_id = b.id
	  join project_mapping pm on b.id = pm.row_id
  	join user_accounts ua on i.assignee_id = ua.account_id
    join users u on ua.user_id = u.id
    join team_users tu on u.id = tu.user_id
    join teams t on tu.team_id = t.id
  WHERE
    $__timeFilter(i.created_date)
    and pm.project_name in (${project:sqlstring}+'')
  ORDER BY 1
)

SELECT
  DATE_ADD(date(created_date), INTERVAL -$interval(date(created_date))+1 DAY) as time,
  sum(case when status = 'DONE' and team_id in (${team1:sqlstring}+'') then story_point else 0 end)/(select count(distinct user_id) from team_users where team_id in (${team1:sqlstring}+'')) as 'Team1: Story Points Completed per Member',
  sum(case when status = 'DONE' and team_id in (${team2:sqlstring}+'') then story_point else 0 end)/(select count(distinct user_id) from team_users where team_id in (${team2:sqlstring}+'')) as 'Team2: Story Points Completed per Member',
  count(distinct id)/(select count(*) FROM users) as "Org: Story Points Completed per Member"
FROM _issues
GROUP BY 1

panels.title: 4. PR Review Depth and PR Size

targets.rawSql:
with _merged_prs as(
  SELECT
    distinct pr.id,
    pr.url,
    pr.created_date,
    pr.merged_date,
    pr.author_id,
    prc.id as comment_id,
    u.id as user_id,
    u.name as user_name,
    t.id as team_id,
    t.name as team
  FROM pull_requests pr
    join project_mapping pm on pr.base_repo_id = pm.row_id and pm.table = 'repos' 
    left join pull_request_comments prc on pr.id = prc.pull_request_id
    join user_accounts ua on pr.author_id = ua.account_id
    join users u on ua.user_id = u.id
    join team_users tu on u.id = tu.user_id
    join teams t on tu.team_id = t.id
  WHERE
    $__timeFilter(pr.created_date)
    and pm.project_name in (${project:sqlstring}+'')
    and pr.merged_date is not null
  ORDER BY 1
)

select
  DATE_ADD(date(created_date), INTERVAL -$interval(date(created_date))+1 DAY) as time,
  count(distinct case when team_id in (${team1:sqlstring}+'') then comment_id else null end)/(select count(distinct user_id) from team_users where team_id in (${team1:sqlstring}+'')) as "Team1: PR Review Depth",
  count(distinct case when team_id in (${team2:sqlstring}+'') then comment_id else null end)/(select count(distinct user_id) from team_users where team_id in (${team2:sqlstring}+'')) as "Team2: PR Review Depth",
  count(distinct comment_id)/(select count(*) FROM users) as "Org: PR Review Depth"
FROM _merged_prs
GROUP BY 1

panels.title: Average PR Review Depth per Team

targets.rawSql:
with _prs as(
  SELECT
    distinct pr.id,
    pr.url,
    pr.created_date,
    pr.merged_date,
    pr.author_id,
    pr.merge_commit_sha,
    c.additions + c.deletions as loc,
    u.id as user_id,
    u.name as user_name,
    t.id as team_id,
    t.name as team
  FROM pull_requests pr
    join project_mapping pm on pr.base_repo_id = pm.row_id and pm.table = 'repos' 
   left join commits c on pr.merge_commit_sha = c.sha
    join user_accounts ua on pr.author_id = ua.account_id
    join users u on ua.user_id = u.id
    join team_users tu on u.id = tu.user_id
    join teams t on tu.team_id = t.id
  WHERE
    $__timeFilter(pr.created_date)
    and pm.project_name in (${project:sqlstring}+'')
    and pr.status = 'MERGED'
  ORDER BY 1
)

select
  DATE_ADD(date(created_date), INTERVAL -$interval(date(created_date))+1 DAY) as time,
  sum(case when team_id in (${team1:sqlstring}+'') then loc else null end)/(select count(distinct user_id) from team_users where team_id in (${team1:sqlstring}+'')) as "Team1: PR Size",
  sum(case when team_id in (${team2:sqlstring}+'') then loc else null end)/(select count(distinct user_id) from team_users where team_id in (${team2:sqlstring}+'')) as "Team2: PR Size",
  sum(loc)/(select count(*) FROM users) as "Org: PR Size"
FROM _prs
GROUP BY 1
ORDER BY 1

links.title: Bug Count per 1k Lines of Code

targets.rawSql:
with _bugs as(
  SELECT
    distinct i.id,
    i.url,
    i.created_date,
    i.status,
    i.assignee_id,
    i.story_point,
    i.priority,
    u.id as user_id,
    u.name as user_name,
    t.id as team_id,
    t.name as team
  FROM issues i
	  join board_issues bi on i.id = bi.issue_id
	  join boards b on bi.board_id = b.id
	  join project_mapping pm on b.id = pm.row_id
  	join user_accounts ua on i.assignee_id = ua.account_id
    join users u on ua.user_id = u.id
    join team_users tu on u.id = tu.user_id
    join teams t on tu.team_id = t.id
  WHERE
    $__timeFilter(i.created_date)
    and pm.project_name in (${project:sqlstring}+'')
    and i.type = 'BUG'
  ORDER BY 1
)

SELECT
  DATE_ADD(date(created_date), INTERVAL -$interval(date(created_date))+1 DAY) as time,
  count(case when team_id in (${team1:sqlstring}+'') then id else null end) as 'Team1: P0/P1 Bugs',
  count(case when team_id in (${team2:sqlstring}+'') then id else null end) as 'Team2: P0/P1 Bugs'
FROM _bugs
WHERE
  -- please choose the priorities in the filter above
  priority in (${priority:sqlstring}+'')
GROUP BY 1
ORDER BY 1

links.title: Bug Count per 1k Lines of Code

targets.rawSql:
with _bugs as(
  SELECT
    distinct i.id,
    i.url,
    i.created_date,
    i.status,
    i.assignee_id,
    i.story_point,
    i.priority,
    u.id as user_id,
    u.name as user_name,
    t.id as team_id,
    t.name as team
  FROM issues i
	  join board_issues bi on i.id = bi.issue_id
	  join boards b on bi.board_id = b.id
	  join project_mapping pm on b.id = pm.row_id
  	join user_accounts ua on i.assignee_id = ua.account_id
    join users u on ua.user_id = u.id
    join team_users tu on u.id = tu.user_id
    join teams t on tu.team_id = t.id
  WHERE
    $__timeFilter(i.created_date)
    and pm.project_name in (${project:sqlstring}+'')
    and i.type = 'BUG'
  ORDER BY 1
)

SELECT
  DATE_ADD(date(created_date), INTERVAL -$interval(date(created_date))+1 DAY) as time,
  count(case when team_id in (${team1:sqlstring}+'') then id else null end)/(select count(distinct user_id) from team_users where team_id in (${team1:sqlstring}+'')) as 'Team1: P0/P1 Bugs per Member',
  count(case when team_id in (${team2:sqlstring}+'') then id else null end)/(select count(distinct user_id) from team_users where team_id in (${team2:sqlstring}+'')) as 'Team2: P0/P1 Bugs per Member',
  count(distinct id)/(select count(*) FROM users) as "Org: P0/P1 Bugs per Member"
FROM _bugs
WHERE
  -- please choose the priorities in the filter above
  priority in (${priority:sqlstring}+'')
GROUP BY 1
ORDER BY 1

with _prs as(
  SELECT
    pr.id,
    pr.created_date as pr_issued_date,
    -- convert null to 0 if a PR has no cycle_time to make sure cycle_time equals the sum of the four metrics below
		coalesce(prm.pr_cycle_time/60,0) as cycle_time,
		pr.author_id,
    u.id as user_id,
    u.name as user_name,
    t.id as team_id,
    t.name as team
  FROM pull_requests pr
    join project_mapping pm on pr.base_repo_id = pm.row_id and pm.table = 'repos' 
		left join project_pr_metrics prm on pr.id = prm.id
    left join user_accounts ua on pr.author_id = ua.account_id
    left join users u on ua.user_id = u.id
    left join team_users tu on u.id = tu.user_id
    left join teams t on tu.team_id = t.id
  WHERE
    $__timeFilter(pr.created_date)
    and pm.project_name in (${project:sqlstring}+'')
  GROUP BY 1,2,3,4,5,6,7,8
)

SELECT 
  DATE_ADD(date(pr_issued_date), INTERVAL -$interval(date(pr_issued_date))+1 DAY) as time,
  avg(case when team_id in (${team1:sqlstring}+'') then cycle_time end) as 'Team1: Avg Cycle Time(h)',
  avg(case when team_id in (${team2:sqlstring}+'') then cycle_time end) as 'Team2: Avg Cycle Time(h)'
FROM _prs
GROUP BY 1
ORDER BY 1

with _prs as(
  SELECT
    pr.id,
    pr.created_date as pr_issued_date,
    -- convert null to 0 if a PR has no coding_time to make sure cycle_time equals the sum of the four sub-metrics
		coalesce(prm.pr_coding_time/60,0) as coding_time,
		pr.author_id,
    u.id as user_id,
    u.name as user_name,
    t.id as team_id,
    t.name as team
  FROM pull_requests pr
    join project_mapping pm on pr.base_repo_id = pm.row_id and pm.table = 'repos' 
		left join project_pr_metrics prm on pr.id = prm.id
    left join user_accounts ua on pr.author_id = ua.account_id
    left join users u on ua.user_id = u.id
    left join team_users tu on u.id = tu.user_id
    left join teams t on tu.team_id = t.id
  WHERE
    $__timeFilter(pr.created_date)
    and pm.project_name in (${project:sqlstring}+'')
  GROUP BY 1,2,3,4,5,6,7,8
)

SELECT 
  DATE_ADD(date(pr_issued_date), INTERVAL -$interval(date(pr_issued_date))+1 DAY) as time,
  avg(case when team_id in (${team1:sqlstring}+'') then coding_time end) as 'Team1: Avg Coding Time(h)',
  avg(case when team_id in (${team2:sqlstring}+'') then coding_time end) as 'Team2: Avg Coding Time(h)'
FROM _prs
GROUP BY 1
ORDER BY 1

with _prs as(
  SELECT
    pr.id,
    pr.created_date as pr_issued_date,
    -- convert null to 0 if a PR has no pickup_time to make sure cycle_time equals the sum of the four sub-metrics
		coalesce(prm.pr_pickup_time/60,0) as pickup_time,
		pr.author_id,
    u.id as user_id,
    u.name as user_name,
    t.id as team_id,
    t.name as team
  FROM pull_requests pr
    join project_mapping pm on pr.base_repo_id = pm.row_id and pm.table = 'repos' 
		left join project_pr_metrics prm on pr.id = prm.id
    left join user_accounts ua on pr.author_id = ua.account_id
    left join users u on ua.user_id = u.id
    left join team_users tu on u.id = tu.user_id
    left join teams t on tu.team_id = t.id
  WHERE
    $__timeFilter(pr.created_date)
    and pm.project_name in (${project:sqlstring}+'')
  GROUP BY 1,2,3,4,5,6,7,8
)

SELECT 
  DATE_ADD(date(pr_issued_date), INTERVAL -$interval(date(pr_issued_date))+1 DAY) as time,
  avg(case when team_id in (${team1:sqlstring}+'') then pickup_time end) as 'Team1: Avg Pickup Time(h)',
  avg(case when team_id in (${team2:sqlstring}+'') then pickup_time end) as 'Team2: Avg Pickup Time(h)'
FROM _prs
GROUP BY 1
ORDER BY 1

with _prs as(
  SELECT
    pr.id,
    pr.created_date as pr_issued_date,
    -- convert null to 0 if a PR has no review_time to make sure cycle_time equals the sum of the four sub-metrics
		coalesce(prm.pr_review_time/60,0) as review_time,
		pr.author_id,
    u.id as user_id,
    u.name as user_name,
    t.id as team_id,
    t.name as team
  FROM pull_requests pr
    join project_mapping pm on pr.base_repo_id = pm.row_id and pm.table = 'repos' 
		left join project_pr_metrics prm on pr.id = prm.id
    left join user_accounts ua on pr.author_id = ua.account_id
    left join users u on ua.user_id = u.id
    left join team_users tu on u.id = tu.user_id
    left join teams t on tu.team_id = t.id
  WHERE
    $__timeFilter(pr.created_date)
    and pm.project_name in (${project:sqlstring}+'')
  GROUP BY 1,2,3,4,5,6,7,8
)

SELECT 
  DATE_ADD(date(pr_issued_date), INTERVAL -$interval(date(pr_issued_date))+1 DAY) as time,
  avg(case when team_id in (${team1:sqlstring}+'') then review_time end) as 'Team1: Avg Review Time(h)',
  avg(case when team_id in (${team2:sqlstring}+'') then review_time end) as 'Team2: Avg Review Time(h)'
FROM _prs
GROUP BY 1
ORDER BY 1

with _prs as(
  SELECT
    pr.id,
    pr.created_date as pr_issued_date,
    -- convert null to 0 if a PR has no deploy_time to make sure cycle_time equals the sum of the four sub-metrics
		coalesce(prm.pr_deploy_time/60,0) as deploy_time,
		pr.author_id,
    u.id as user_id,
    u.name as user_name,
    t.id as team_id,
    t.name as team
  FROM pull_requests pr
    join project_mapping pm on pr.base_repo_id = pm.row_id and pm.table = 'repos' 
		left join project_pr_metrics prm on pr.id = prm.id
    left join user_accounts ua on pr.author_id = ua.account_id
    left join users u on ua.user_id = u.id
    left join team_users tu on u.id = tu.user_id
    left join teams t on tu.team_id = t.id
  WHERE
    $__timeFilter(pr.created_date)
    and pm.project_name in (${project:sqlstring}+'')
  GROUP BY 1,2,3,4,5,6,7,8
)

SELECT 
  DATE_ADD(date(pr_issued_date), INTERVAL -$interval(date(pr_issued_date))+1 DAY) as time,
  avg(case when team_id in (${team1:sqlstring}+'') then deploy_time end) as 'Team1: Avg Deploy Time(h)',
  avg(case when team_id in (${team2:sqlstring}+'') then deploy_time end) as 'Team2: Avg Deploy Time(h)'
FROM _prs
GROUP BY 1
ORDER BY 1

with _merged_prs as(
  SELECT
    distinct pr.id,
    pr.url,
    pr.created_date,
    pr.merged_date,
    pr.author_id,
    u.id as user_id,
    u.name as user_name,
    t.id as team_id,
    t.name as team
  FROM pull_requests pr
    join project_mapping pm on pr.base_repo_id = pm.row_id and pm.table = 'repos' 
    join user_accounts ua on pr.author_id = ua.account_id
    join users u on ua.user_id = u.id
    join team_users tu on u.id = tu.user_id
    join teams t on tu.team_id = t.id
  WHERE
    $__timeFilter(pr.created_date)
    and pm.project_name in (${project:sqlstring}+'')
    and pr.merged_date is not null
  ORDER BY 1
)

SELECT
  DATE_ADD(date(created_date), INTERVAL -$interval(date(created_date))+1 DAY) as time,
  count(distinct case when team_id in (${team1:sqlstring}+'') and id not in (SELECT pull_request_id FROM pull_request_comments) then id else null end) as "Team1: PRs Merged w/o Review",
  count(distinct case when team_id in (${team2:sqlstring}+'') and id not in (SELECT pull_request_id FROM pull_request_comments) then id else null end) as "Team2: PRs Merged w/o Review"
FROM _merged_prs
GROUP BY 1
